attributes.action: Make provision for people who achieved non-degree qualifications to upgrade them to degree status
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the days before the massive rebranding of all FE establishments as universities many of us studied for longer than students who are now awarded degrees for a couple of years part-time study.  We are now at a disadvantage in the job market as those diplomas are not equally valued.
